reviewText:
Looks great on a standard definition TV but absolutely awful on a large Big Screen HDTV. You can see pixelation, lines, blips.  Too bad. HD would have been awesome.
My BluRay player is supposed to updgrade STD DVD's but it did not work on this DVD.  Still, I liked it on my old 19 inch TV.
Awsome video.  If you love animals as I do,  you will find this video right up your alley.
